message.Welcome to Zork - The Unofficial TypeScr: Welcome to Zork - The Unofficial TypeScript Version.
message.You are standing in an open field west o: You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.
message.(A secret path leads southwest into the: (A secret path leads southwest into the forest.)
message.This is a forest, with trees in all dire: This is a forest, with trees in all directions. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.
message.You are in a clearing, with a forest sur: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on all sides. A path leads south.
message.There is an open grating, descending int: There is an open grating, descending into darkness.
message.You are in a tiny cave with a dark, forb: You are in a tiny cave with a dark, forbidding staircase leading down.
message.There is a skeleton of a human male in o: There is a skeleton of a human male in one corner.

history.open mailbox: Opening the small mailbox reveals a leaflet.
history.go east: The door is boarded and you cannot remove the boards.
history.look at house: The house is a beautiful colonial house which is painted white. It is clear that the owners must have been extremely wealthy.
history.read leaflet: Welcome to the Unofficial TypeScript Version of Zork. Your mission is to find a Jade Statue.
history.go west: You would need a machete to go further west.
history.go north: The forest becomes impenetrable to the North.
history.go south again: You see a large ogre and turn around.
history.take skeleton: Why would you do that? Are you some sort of sicko?
history.smash skeleton: Sick person. Have some respect mate.
history.light up room: You would need a torch or lamp to do that.
history.break skeleton: I have two questions: Why and With What?
history.suicide: You throw yourself down the staircase as an attempt at suicide. You die.
history.open trunk: You have found the Jade Statue and have completed your quest!
